data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Color::Scheme creates usable, aesthetically-pleasing color schemes
    from a single given color. It uses a modified color wheel and unique
    algorithm to generate sets of colors in #RRGGBB notation.

    The module is actually a Perl port of the Color Schemes 2 color
    scheme generator, which is a JavaScript-based interactive utility:

    http://wellstyled.com/tools/colorscheme2/index-en.html
